entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Consider releasing a supported version of Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebAssembly.MultipartBundle #36978
  • .Net 6 RC1 - Cannot set reponse headers in ExceptionMiddleware returning IAsyncEnumerable in controller #36977
  • Overwriting RenderTreeFrame within RenderTreeBuilder for a Markdown blazor component #36976
  • Startup improvement: caching, json #36975
  • Startup regression: updates #36974
  • Perf regression: connectionclose #36973
  • User's secrets are not used in the new templates in Net 6 RC1 #36971
  • How to reference ProblemDetails in Blazor "shared" project? #36970
  • Blazor - support variable height container in Virtualize component #36969
  • The PageTitle component doesn't update the title when navigating directly to a page #36967
  • SupplyParameterFromQuery doesn't work in non-routable components #36966
  • Single file build time regression: plaintext #36964
  • Perf regression: plaintext_actix, updates #36962
  • Brotli compression + disable response buffering for plain text yields incorrect response body #36960

Closed

  • Unhandled exception in c++ client's hub_connection::stop() method due to cancellation logic #35515
    6.0-rc2
  • Startup regression: https #36942
  • Startup regression: https #36963
  • Perf improvement: mapaction, single_query #36961
  • The type initializer for 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.SignalR.Protocol.JsonHubProtocol' threw an exception. #36965
  • [Discussion] Actions returning IAsyncEnumerable<> are no longer buffered by MVC when using System.Text.Json #32483
    Discussions
  • Improve Razor Formatting Perf #31542
    17.0-Preview5
  • Can we remove the MapToDocumentEdits call in Razor On Type formatting? #36319
    17.0-Preview5

PullRequests

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0-rc2' => 'release/6.0' #36972
    area-infrastructure, area-mvc, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0-rc2] Use TryParse and BindAsync methods from interfaces #36959
    Servicing-approved
  • Fix BoundAttributDescriptor.GetHashCode and add test (#36679) #36956
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc
  • [release/6.0] Fix alpine queue used for Helix #36939
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.0
  • Go back to alpine 3.12 #36951
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Strongly-typed SignalR hub proxies and callback handlers #33717
    area-signalr, api-suggestion, community-contribution
  • Include system crash dumps in artifacts #36824
    area-infrastructure
  • Add MapPatch API to endpointRouteBuilderExtensions #36818
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • http logging log level enhancement #36873
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Use TryParse and BindAsync methods from interfaces #36955
